S

saveFileName() - Method in class dicomreader.DicomReaderGUI
The saveFileName method shows a file chooser dialog window to select the file we wish to save.
saveImage(String, String, boolean) - Method in class dicomreader.DicomReader
The saveImage method stores the image or the images that are into the Dicom file to a pure ASCII text, ordering pixel values into rows and columns as in a trivial image.
savePGM - Variable in class dicomreader.DicomReaderGUI
 
seqN - Variable in class dicomreader.DicomReader
 
setAsciiFileName() - Method in class dicomreader.DicomReaderGUI
The setAsciiFileName method sets the ascii image file where pixel values will be saved to.
setAsciiName - Variable in class dicomreader.DicomReaderGUI
 
setDicomFileName() - Method in class dicomreader.DicomReaderGUI
The setDicomFileName method sets the Dicom file to analize.
setDicomName - Variable in class dicomreader.DicomReaderGUI
 
setHeadersFileName() - Method in class dicomreader.DicomReaderGUI
The setHeadersFileName method sets the headers file where headers will be saved to.
setHeadersName - Variable in class dicomreader.DicomReaderGUI
 
ShowGPL - Class in dicomreader
The ShowGPL class is called by the DicomReaderGUI class to show the GNU General Public License to the end user.
ShowGPL() - Constructor for class dicomreader.ShowGPL
The class contructor puts all graphics application's components.
showResult() - Method in class dicomreader.ShowGPL
The showResult method opens the GPL file and shows it to the user.
slices - Variable in class dicomreader.DicomReader.Image
 
storeData(boolean) - Method in class dicomreader.DicomReader
The storeData method recognizes Dicom files with more than one slice and executes the saveImage method to obtain the right number of image files.
storeImageParam(String, String) - Method in class dicomreader.DicomReader
The storeImageParam method sets the Image object's fields.
